ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.1_0: Having sexual intercourse, How many things that are a condition for the seven days?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.2_0: Having sexual intercourse, three things that are a condition for settling,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.3_0: resolution face-to-face and acting according to what has been admitted,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.4_0: If it has been resolved face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, even though he has a suitable reason?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water three times, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.3_0: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.15:3.1_0: The seventh section consisting of the communal recitation is finished.
